name: W-Gift by W-COIN
description:
W-COIN proudly presents the W-Gift Campaign, a special initiative designed to reward our loyal community members. If you receive the exclusive W-Gift NFT ticket, you can effortlessly claim your reward via the W-Gift Bot.

W-Coin is a community-driven DApp that empowers users to shape the future of the W-Token. During the mining phase, our community voted to build W-Coin on the TON blockchain, prioritizing it over Solana and Ethereum.

Be part of this exciting journeyâ€”claim your reward and help shape the future of W-COIN today!
